attributes.title: Horrible App!!!
attributes.review: Oh god where to start. First off, upon downloading the app, somehow it changed my home and lock screen photos to pictures of penis‚Äôs and it won‚Äôt let me change them back. Then when I opened the app, it asked me if I was a furry and upon clicking no it proceed to show me vulgar and inappropriate pictures and videos of what I assume are furry‚Äôs committing lewd and disgusting acts. After what felt like forever the app then asked if I wanted to take a ‚Äúshort‚Äù survey. The word short is in quotes because in actuality the survey took me 3 days and 4 hours to complete. I had to miss my daughters wedding vows just to complete it. The questions started off normal. They asked my name, age, and political party. Then they got weirder and weirder. The survey started asking things like ‚ÄúAre you in the Illuminati?‚Äù And ‚ÄúDo you believe in Crumple-Horned Snorkacks.‚Äù Once the survey was finished I heard a pounding on my door. Turns out it was the Italian mafia. They kidnapped me and brought me to a remote location and told me that they kidnapped and imprisoned me because I downloaded this app and now I have 1 year to fall in love with the dominant mafia boss 365 days style. I just hope I don‚Äôt have to recreate any of the movie scenes with him (especially the boat scene) because he‚Äôs very old and ugly. I managed to escaped after 4 weeks and now have to undergo therapy and counseling sessions. I have trauma from that experience. I then opened the app again to see if there‚Äôs anything to do on it and the app made my phone become sentient and try to kill my cat. I highly do not recommend this app and will be deleting it as soon as I find a way to destroy my phone. PS I am writing this from a friends phone. She has had a similar experience aside from the sentient phone part.
